name: Dash & Dodge
description:
Hello, there! 👋🏽

BenBam here, I've been learning unity for the last 9 days (as of Aug 11, 2022), and I am so excited to share with you all my first ever game, I have coded this little game and created all visual assets from scratch following a few curses and tutorials! 

Feel free to leave comments and feedback is much appreciated! 💙

PS. DON'T FORGET TO ADD A COMMENT WITH YOUR SCORE!

Have a great day. ✨

Music:

Bushwick Tarantella by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 license. https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Artist: http://incompetech.com/
